name: Mirrored World (MiriPlex)
description:
You are playing for the mirrorian (unic biological species, which can travel throug the different mirrored worlds) and you have to find your home.

You are able to move big mirror (which you will find on each level) with your mouse and move mirrorian using WASD keys.

For now my game have just 4 levels but it will get updates, I hope, soon.
